page.title: 07COMPUTERS AT ASHFORDS
page.content: At Ashfords we looked at the rhino- ceros logo above the door represent- ing{heavy work.}Ashfords is a factory building company. Once it built a company called Aset.Now it is named after the managing director.They employ about 25 people.They have 2 computers and many calculaters.One is for computing accounts and wages.They also have a wordprocessor and photocopying machine.Also there's a big computer which can make and copy big plans.When this computer is operating,it starts to get hot and smells terribly. Ashford's is busy building in many places like Spalding Telford and Redditch.We had an enjoyable time there using calcul- laters.The staff were friendly and very helpful. Outside we saw a huge J.C.B.{Meadow Green
